entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
